word_mean: 全称“倾倒废弃物”。通过船舶、航空器、平台或者其他运载工具，向海洋倾倒废弃物和其他有害物质的行为。

sentence.Network_en: I thought he was going to dump me for another girl.
sentence.Network_cn: 我以为他要为了另一个女孩而和我分手。

sentence.Network_en: The government declared that it did not dump radioactive waste at sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府宣称并未将放射性废料倾倒在海里。

sentence.Network_en: It's a bit much expecting me to dump your boyfriend for you.
sentence.Network_cn: 指望我替你甩掉你的男朋友，有点儿过分了吧？

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal, N. Amer.)criticize or abuse (someone); treat badly
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式，北美)诘难，辱骂；亏待，虐待

lj.lj_ly: you get dumped on just because of your name.
lj.lj_ls: 你受此欺辱仅仅是因为你的名字。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: perhaps from Old Norse; related to Danish dumpe and Norwegian dumpa 'fall suddenly' (the original sense in English); in later use partly imitative; compare with thump

encyclopedia.content: 简介 (1) 在特定时刻，将整个储存装置或储存装置之某部分的内容记录在另一储存装置中。倾出的目的通常是为了除错。 (2) 将具备可读格式的数据从主要或辅助储存体复制至外部媒体，如磁带、磁盘或打印机等媒体。 (3) 为收集错误信息而复制整个虚拟储存体或虚拟储存体之某部分的内容。 linux dump 功能说明：备份文件系统。 语 法：dump [-cnu][-0123456789][-b <区块大小>][-B <区块数目>][-d <密度>][-f <设

entry.def: If you dump something somewhere, you put it or unload it there quickly and carelessly.

example.ex: We dumped our bags at the nearby Grand Hotel and hurried towards the market...
example.tran: 我们把包扔在附近的格兰德酒店后就匆匆赶往集市。

example.ex: He got my haversack from the cab and dumped it at my feet.
example.tran: 他把我的背包从出租车上取来丢到我脚下。

entry.def: If something is dumped somewhere, it is put or left there because it is no longer wanted or needed.

example.ex: The getaway car was dumped near a motorway tunnel...
example.tran: 逃亡用的车被丢弃在高速公路隧道附近。

example.ex: A million tonnes of untreated sewage is dumped into the sea...
example.tran: 一百万吨未经处理的污水被倾倒进了海里。

entry.def: A dump is a place where rubbish is left, for example on open ground outside a town.

example.ex: ...companies that bring their rubbish straight to the dump...
example.tran: 将其废弃物直接运送至垃圾场的公司

example.ex: The walled garden was used as a dump.
example.tran: 带围墙的花园被用作了垃圾场。

entry.tran: 肮脏的地方;乱七八糟的地方
entry.def: If you say that a place is a dump, you think it is ugly and unpleasant to live in or visit.

example.ex: 'What a dump!' Christabel said, standing in the doorway of the youth hostel.
example.tran: “真够脏乱的！”克丽丝特布尔站在青年旅社的门口说道。

entry.tran: (军队中粮食、武器等的)临时堆积处,临时仓库
entry.def: A dump is a place where an army stores food and weapons temporarily while it is stationed in a particular place.

entry.tran: 不再支持,摒弃(政策、想法等)
entry.def: To dump something such as an idea, policy, or practice means to stop supporting or using it.

example.ex: Ministers believed it was vital to dump the poll tax before the election.
example.tran: 大臣们认为在大选前停止征收人头税至关重要。

entry.tran: (通常指为占领海外市场)倾销,抛售
entry.def: If a firm or company dumps goods, it sells large quantities of them at prices far below their real value, usually in another country, in order to gain a bigger market share or to keep prices high in the home market.

example.ex: It produces more than it needs, then dumps its surplus onto the world market.
example.tran: 当产量超过需求时,过剩的产品便倾销到世界市场。

entry.tran: 与…断绝关系;与…结束关系
entry.def: If you dump someone, you end your relationship with them.

example.ex: I thought he was going to dump me for another girl...
example.tran: 我以为他要为了另一个女孩而和我分手。

example.ex: She was dumped by her long-term lover after five years...
example.tran: 5 年后她被相恋多年的恋人抛弃了。

entry.def: If you say that a parent dumps a child with someone, you are criticizing the parent for leaving the child to be looked after by that person.

example.ex: I was sometimes dumped with my grandmother or left with highly unsuitable au pairs...
example.tran: 有时我被扔给奶奶照看，或者被交给毫无经验的临时保姆。

example.ex: He can't cope and dumps his two teenage boys on them to be looked after.
example.tran: 他应付不过来，只能将他那两个十来岁的儿子交给他们代为照看。

entry.def: To dump computer data or memory means to copy it from one storage system onto another, such as from disk to magnetic tape.

example.ex: It can take a couple of hours to dump a thousand telephone numbers into a 128k EPROM pack...
example.tran: 将 1,000 个电话号码转存到一个128k的EPROM芯片要花好几个小时。

example.ex: All the data is then dumped into the main computer.
example.tran: 所有数据随后被转存至主计算机。

entry.tran: 转存信息库;转储数据库
entry.def: A dump is a list of the data that is stored in a computer's memory at a particular time. Dumps are often used by computer programmers to find out what is causing a problem with a program.
If someone dumps on you, they treat you very badly and unfairly.

example.ex: He was a nice guy, Mona. He didn't dump on me.
example.tran: 莫娜,他是个不错的家伙,没有亏待我。

entry.tran: 郁闷的;沮丧的;闷闷不乐的
entry.def: If you are down in the dumps, you are feeling very depressed and miserable.

example.ex: She's feeling a bit down in the dumps and needs cheering up.
example.tran: 她情绪有点低落，需要振奋起来。

means.word_mean: 2. a piece of land where waste materials are dumped
3. (computer science) a copy of the contents of a computer storage device; sometimes used in debugging programs
2. sever all ties with, usually unceremoniously or irresponsibly;

sentences.sentence: "The company dumped him after many years of service"
"She dumped her boyfriend when she fell in love with a rich man"

means.word_mean: 4. drop in a heap or mass

sentences.sentence: "It plunged to the bottom of the well"

auth_sentence.content: Pipes which dump untreated sewage at...the low tide mark.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pipes which dump untreated sewage at...the low tide mark.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pipes which dump untreated sewage at...the low tide mark.

auth_sentence.content: It is expected to dump six inches of snow.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is expected to dump six inches of snow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is expected to dump six inches of snow.

auth_sentence.content: Industries could dump whatever crap they wanted into rivers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Industries could dump whatever crap they wanted into rivers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Industries could dump whatever crap they wanted into rivers.

sentences.en: It's no use letting yourself fall into the dumps.
sentences.cn: 你听任自己的情绪低沉下去一点用也没有。

means.word_mean: 猛地扔下，使砰地落下；沉重地放下

sentences.en: The delivery boy dumped the groceries on the back porch.
sentences.cn: 送货员猛地把食品杂货扔在后面的门廊上。

means.word_mean: 把…倒空；(倾斜或翻过来)倾倒

sentences.en: Just dump everything over there. I'll sort it out later.
sentences.cn: 把所有东西都倒在那边，我以后再清理。

means.word_mean: (未经预映或宣传)直接放映(影片)，直销(影片)

sentences.en: The movie was dumped on New Year's Eve.
sentences.cn: 这部影片未经预映便于除夕夜直接放映了。

means.word_mean: 突然掉下(或落下)，砰地落下(或放下) (down)

sentences.en: He dumped down in the wave.

jushi.english: Life in such a dump is unbearable.
jushi.chinese: 在这种地方过日子真受不了。

jushi.english: It's no use letting yourself fall into the dumps.
jushi.chinese: 你听任自己的情绪低沉下去一点用也没有。

jushi.english: There is a dump behind the house.
jushi.chinese: 房子后面有一个垃圾场。
